akn:section.akn:heading: Special pay: accession and retention bonuses for psychologists

akn:content.akn:p: (d) The agreement referred to in subsections (a) and (b) shall provide that, consistent with the needs of the armed force concerned, the person or officer executing the agreement will be assigned to duty, for the period of obligated service covered by the agreement, as an officer of such armed force as a psychologist.
(f) No agreement under subsection (a) or (b) may be entered into after December 31, 2018.
